thread.title: Great for a business visit - Review
thread.title_full: Great for a business visit - Review of Novotel London City South, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: shanart
title: Great for a business visit - Review
text: Stayed here for a week while attending business meeting .. Clean comfortable rooms close to borough market , london tower and the bridge .. Many good restaurants close by. The hop on - off bus stops right in front of the hotel . Breakfast spread is ok ..Overall a good stay and recommended.
